# OMEManage

The goal of OMEManage is to â€¦

## Installation

You can install the development version of OMEManage from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("Jake-Powell/OMEManage")
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`check_ID()`](https://jake-powell.github.io/OMELink/reference/check_ID.md)
  : Check ID Column Format and Establishment Number Consistency
- [`clean_name()`](https://jake-powell.github.io/OMELink/reference/clean_name.md)
  : Clean names
- [`expand_name_variants()`](https://jake-powell.github.io/OMELink/reference/expand_name_variants.md)
  : Expand Rows by Name Variants
- [`match_people_to_data()`](https://jake-powell.github.io/OMELink/reference/match_people_to_data.md)
  : Match Multiple People to Grouped Data
- [`match_person_to_data()`](https://jake-powell.github.io/OMELink/reference/match_person_to_data.md)
  : Match a Person's Name to a Data Frame of Individuals
- [`match_person_to_grouped_data()`](https://jake-powell.github.io/OMELink/reference/match_person_to_grouped_data.md)
  : Match a Person to Grouped Data

# Articles

### All vignettes

- [Case Study: Matching names to a name
  database](https://jake-powell.github.io/OMELink/articles/Matching_names_to_a_name_database.md):
